title: In Australia
fullText:
Service pillars shall be earthed by one of the following methods in accordance with AS/NZS 3000 for individual outbuildings:
(a) Connected to a protective earthing conductor. See Figure 2.4.
(b) Connected as a separate MEN installation. See Figure 2.5.
Further information on the requirements of these earthing arrangements are in AS/NZS 3000.
